means: 黄疸病( jaundice的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The financial markets are taking a jaundiced view of the Government's motives.
sentence.Network_cn: 金融市场对政府的动机存有偏见。

sentence.Network_en: He had a jaundiced view of life.
His social position jaundiced his view of things.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的社会地位使他对事情的看法持有偏见.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... jaundice 妒忌 jaundiced 有偏见的 JCM 工作特性模型.

list.abs: 1．肝细胞性黄疸肝细胞性黄疸（hepatocellular jaundice）是由于感染或中毒，使肝细胞受损害（肝窦面肝细胞膜微突减少，内质网减少，变得稀疏和空泡形成，线粒体肿胀.
3）阻塞性黄疸(obstructive jaundice) 各种原因引起的胆汁排泄通道受阻，胆小管和毛细血管内压力增大破裂，致使结合胆红素逆流入 …
病理生理学词汇英... ... obstructive hypoventilation 阻塞性通气不足 obstructive jaundice 梗阻性黄疸 occult edema 隐性水肿.
医学英语专业词汇——儿科学（三） ... phototherapy 光照疗法 physiologic jaundice 生理性黄疸 pigeon chest 鸡胸.
新生儿黄疸(neonatal jaundice)是胆红素(大部分未为结合胆红素)在体内积聚而引起，其原因复杂，有生理性和病理性之分；部分病理 …

entry.tran: 有偏见的；狭隘的；敌视的
entry.def: If someone has a jaundiced view of something, they can see only the bad aspects of it.

example.ex: The financial markets are taking a jaundiced view of the Government's motives...
example.tran: 金融市场对政府的动机存有偏见。

example.ex: The general watched the proceedings with a jaundiced eye.
example.tran: 这位将军以带有偏见的眼光关注事态发展。

means.word_mean: 1. affected by jaundice which causes yellowing of skin etc
2. showing or affected by prejudice or envy or distaste;

sentences.sentence: "looked with a jaundiced eye on the growth of regimentation"
"takes a jaundiced view of societies and clubs"

auth_sentence.content: Many newborn babies become jaundiced but this is usually temporary.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many newborn babies become jaundiced but this is usually temporary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many newborn babies become jaundiced but this is usually temporary.

auth_sentence.content: Shareholders are pretty jaundiced about boards with Russians on it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shareholders are pretty jaundiced about boards with Russians on it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shareholders are pretty jaundiced about boards with Russians on it.

auth_sentence.content: A comely matron...in a jaundiced satinet gown.
auth_sentence.res_content: A comely matron...in a jaundiced satinet gown.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A comely matron...in a jaundiced satinet gown.

sentences.en: After his experience in jail, he has a pretty jaundiced view of the penal system.
sentences.cn: 经历了牢狱生活之后，他对刑罚制度颇有成见。
